actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933 respecting secured loans upon single-family dwellings.

summary.text: Amends the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933 to increase the percentage of its total outstanding loans which a Federal savings and loan association may secure by first liens on single-family dwellings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933 respecting secured loans upon single-family dwellings.
